div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 10:53 am CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 63. Breezy, with a north wind 22 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 46 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 45. Breezy, with a northwest wind 16 to 21 mph decreasing to 7 to 12 mph in the evening. Winds could gust as high as 33 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 69. Northwest wind 6 to 8 mph.
